statements: SELECT * FROM prescriptions WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM prescriptions WHERE prescription_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM prescriptions WHERE medication_name LIKE '%aspirin%';
SELECT prescription_id, patient_id, medication_name, dosage FROM prescriptions WHERE dosage > 5;
SELECT DISTINCT medication_name FROM prescriptions ORDER BY medication_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM prescriptions WHERE dosage > 10 ORDER BY medication_name DESC, prescription_id ASC
SELECT prescription_id, patient_id, medication_name FROM prescriptions WHERE patient_id = 7 ORDER BY prescription_id DESC
SELECT DISTINCT patient_id FROM prescriptions WHERE medication_name LIKE 'Aspirin%'
SELECT prescription_id, medication_name, dosage FROM prescriptions WHERE dosage BETWEEN 5 AND 10
SELECT prescription_id, patient_id, medication_name, dosage FROM prescriptions WHERE patient_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT * FROM medication_prescriptions WHERE prescription_id = 1;
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM medication_prescriptions WHERE dosage > 50;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM patients ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM medication_prescriptions WHERE medication_name = 'Aspirin';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1980-01-01' AND '1990-12-31';
SELECT * FROM medication_prescriptions WHERE medication_name = 'Aspirin' ORDER BY dosage DESC;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, medication_name, dosage FROM patients JOIN medication_prescriptions ON patients.patient_id = medication_prescriptions.patient_id;
SELECT SUM(dosage) AS total_dosage FROM medication_prescriptions WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, provider_name FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01' ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT medication_name, COUNT(*) AS prescription_count FROM medication_prescriptions GROUP BY medication_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY prescription_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM Medications WHERE dosage > 10;
SELECT prescription_id, patient_id, medication_id, prescription_date FROM Prescriptions WHERE prescription_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, gender FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '1995-12-31';

SELECT Patients.patient_name, Medications.medication_name FROM Patients INNER JOIN Prescriptions ON Patients.patient_id = Prescriptions.patient_id INNER JOIN Medications ON Prescriptions.medication_id = Medications.medication_id;
SELECT patient_name, COUNT(*) AS prescriptions_count FROM Patients INNER JOIN Prescriptions ON Patients.patient_id = Prescriptions.patient_id GROUP BY Patients.patient_name;

SELECT medication_name, SUM(dosage) AS total_dosage FROM Prescriptions INNER JOIN Medications ON Prescriptions.medication_id = Medications.medication_id GROUP BY medication_name ORDER BY total_dosage DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, patient_age FROM Patients WHERE patient_age > 30;
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM Medications ORDER BY medication_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Prescriptions WHERE prescription_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT provider_id, provider_name FROM Providers WHERE provider_location LIKE '%Hospital%';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM Patients WHERE patient_age > 30;

SELECT Patients.patient_name, Medications.medication_name, Prescriptions.prescription_date FROM Patients JOIN Prescriptions ON Patients.patient_id = Prescriptions.patient_id JOIN Medications ON Prescriptions.medication_id = Medications.medication_id;

SELECT Providers.provider_name, Providers.provider_location, COUNT(Prescriptions.prescription_id) AS total_prescriptions FROM Providers JOIN Prescriptions ON Providers.provider_id = Prescriptions.provider_id GROUP BY Providers.provider_name;

SELECT Patients.patient_name, Medications.medication_name, Prescriptions.prescription_date, Medications.dosage FROM Patients JOIN Prescriptions ON Patients.patient_id = Prescriptions.patient_id JOIN Medications ON Prescriptions.medication_id = Medications.medication_id ORDER BY Patients.patient_name ASC, Prescriptions.prescription_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Prescriptions;
SELECT prescription_id, medication_name, dosage, prescription_date FROM Prescriptions WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, gender FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'M';
SELECT prescription_id, medication_name, dosage FROM Prescriptions WHERE dosage > 10;
SELECT medication_name, manufacturer, dosage_form FROM Medications;
SELECT * FROM Prescriptions WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT prescription_id, medication_name, dosage FROM Prescriptions WHERE prescription_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT p.patient_name, pr.provider_name, m.manufacturer FROM Patients p JOIN Provider_Prescriptions pp ON p.patient_id = pp.provider_id JOIN Providers pr ON pp.provider_id = pr.provider_id JOIN Prescriptions ps ON pp.prescription_id = ps.prescription_id JOIN Medications m ON ps.medication_name = m.medication_name;
SELECT * FROM Providers WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology' ORDER BY provider_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_prescriptions, SUM(dosage) AS total_dosage FROM Prescriptions;
